Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: The examination will be online at 15th of July from 10:00 to 12:00 am. You can reach me via Zoom during this time slot.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Four Lectures in presence are a must 3rd/10th/17th/24th of June

Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: Dear students, since room situation is difficult and all lectures are available as videos tomorrow the lecture will not be in presence as last week nobody showed up. However, in the next weeks I really recommend to joining the following lectures on as all will be also in presence. “Social Network Analytics” (3rd of June) “AI & Machine Learning in Research” (10th of June) “Hierarchical Linear Modelling, Conjoint Analyse, Text Analytcs” (17th of June) “Summary” (24th of June) There is not so much material on this lectures, therefore in order to prepare for the examination joining these four lectures will be of great advantage.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Offline lecture tomorrow at 13th of May

Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: Offline lecture tomorrow at 13th of May

Messages.Author: Ira Martina Rosenberg
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I'm sorry that today's lecture must be postponed.  Please watch the lecture video and self-study the supplementary material. Please take notes about your questions, which can be discussed in a following session. It is not necessary to send these questions as emails to Prof. Kratzer, but just hold on to them for the next session or collect them as posts in the forum. Hope you have a nice day and stay healthy! Best Regards, Ira Rosenberg
